title: NRL star Sam Burgess goes shirtless in a leopard print sarong as he parties on a yacht in Mexico
text:
Sam Burgess has been pictured partying on a yacht in Cabo, Mexico this week amid his messy split with wife Phoebe.

In photographs and a video obtained by The Daily Telegraph, the 30-year-old is seen celebrating the 50th birthday of NRL star Sean Garlick's 50th birthday while surrounded by a bevvy of scantly-clad beauties.

At one point, the shirtless NRL star, who plays for the South Sydney Rabbitohs, was spotted dancing with a bikini-clad woman on his shoulders, despite having a shoulder injury that could jeopardise his career.

What will Phoebe say? NRL star Sam Burgess has been spotted partying shirtless in a leopard-print loincloth while dancing with a woman on his shoulders on a yacht in Mexico this week

Sam donned a brown hat, a tribal-inspired necklace and a leopard-print arm tie as he cavorted on the deck of the luxury vessel.

He was also joined by his brother, NRL star and father-of-one Luke Burgess.

Last Saturday, Sam was banned from going within a kilometre of his estranged wife Phoebe's country hideout after an alleged row with her father.

Celebrations: Sam donned a brown hat and a tribal-inspired necklace for the bash, and a leopard print arm tie as he partied while celebrating former NRL star Sean Garlick's 50th birthday

Drama: Last Saturday, Sam was banned from going within a kilometre of his estranged wife Phoebe's country hideout after an alleged row with her father

Sam was visiting his two children at the NSW southern highlands estate last Saturday when he allegedly got into an argument with Mitchell Hooke.

Mr Hooke reportedly asked the NRL superstar to leave the family's three hectare Glenquarry farm - which Burgess did - but police were called about 5pm.

Officers filed an interim apprehended violence order (AVO) against Sam, and court documents revealed he is now barred from coming close to the home.

Making headlines: Sam was visiting his two children at the NSW southern highlands estate last Saturday when he allegedly got into an argument with Mitchell Hooke (L). Phoebe is pictured with the pair

Over: Phoebe was not at the farm during Sam's weekend visit. The glamour couple separated for the second time just weeks ago

He is also banned from coming within a kilometre of any other place where the retired mining executive lives or works.

He was also hit with standard AVO conditions which prevent him from stalking, intimidating or assaulting Phoebe's father.

A NSW Police spokeswoman said police are investigating and 'there are no reports of any injuries.'

Sam is due before Moss Vale Local Court on November 6, where a magistrate could confirm the AVO or dismiss it in its entirety.

There is no suggestion he did anything wrong by visiting the property.

Phoebe was not at the farm during Sam's weekend visit. The glamour couple separated for the second time just weeks ago.
description: Sam Burgess has been pictured partying on a yacht in Cabo, Mexico this week amid his messy split with wife Phoebe.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
